item.title: Stock Market
item.author: Author
item.description: Market Analysis Analysis Technical Analysis Fundamental Analysis Price to Earning Ratio The P/E ratio shows what the market is willing to pay today for a stock based on its past or future earnings A high P/E could mean that a stock’s price is high relative to earnings and possibly overvalued. Conversely, a low P/E might indicate that the current stock price is low relative to earnings.
